content: Tom disse che pensava che Mary fosse infelice.
translations: eng:Tom said he thought Mary was unhappy
eng:Tom said he thought Mary wasn't happy
eng:Tom said he thought that Mary was unhappy
eng:Tom said he thought that Mary wasn't happy
eng:Tom said that he thought Mary was unhappy
eng:Tom said that he thought Mary wasn't happy
eng:Tom said that he thought that Mary was unhappy
eng:Tom said that he thought that Mary wasn't happy
